Reviews.Title: Do not work at all.
Reviews.Author: Bradley Grooms
Reviews.Content: The phone did not turn on. After charging the battery and the replacement battery. It came in a iphone 4 box. with iphone4 instructions. The phone its self looked like a star brand. It was not even a Bedove I5. I returned this phone. Beware of this seller.

CPU: Media Tek MTK6515 1GHz ROM: 2GB,SINGLE SIM

Black PHONE,Back camera: 2MP (with flash light) Front camera: 0.3MP Video recording: Yes
Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Browser, MP3, MP4, MMS, Alarm, Calendar, Calculator...
